类 ReversiModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ReversiModel

  • public class ReversiModel
extends java.util.Observable
    this class is used for represent model, which is 9*9 size this class should be included in controller 2d array will be used for representing the game
    作者:
    wenkaizheng

      simple constructor initial 9*9 size array there are some special position ' '

      this method is simple getter

      this method count all 'b' in the 2d array

      this method count all 'w' in the 2d array

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllWhite

        public int getAllWhite()
        this method count all 'w' in the 2d array
        返回:
        total count

      • getAllBlack

        public int getAllBlack()
        this method count all 'b' in the 2d array
        返回:
        total count

      • set_position

        public void set_position(int i,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        this method put the chess int the model
        参数:
        i - color
        x - x position
        y - y position

      • get_chess

        public char get_chess(int x,
                      int y)
        this method is simple getter
        参数:
        x - x position
        y - y position
        返回:
        the chess in this index

      • getsize

        public int getsize()
        getter
        返回:
        the size of model

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        this method return the String for whole model
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
